banned.label: Banned
banned.tooltip: You've been banned. Please contact the Decentr support team

pdv_consent.hint: You’ll be able to change this later in the user settings page.
pdv_consent.title: You're logged in as

careful.label: Be careful
careful.text1: A new seed phrase is generated when refreshing the page or clicking "Back".
careful.text2: Be sure you saved actual seed phrase before clicking "Next."

seed_phrase_page.subtitle: It is the only way to import or restore your account, so copy, download, print and store it somewhere safely!
seed_phrase_page.title: Store your seed phrase

warning.label: Never share your seed phrase with anyone
warning.text1: Anyone with this phrase can take your Decs forever.
warning.text2: We won’t be able to recover or return your account and wallet to you.
warning.text3: If you lose the seed phrase, your account will be lost forever.

errors.account_conflict: A wallet has already been created for this email or wallet address

hint.label: Decentr can't recover your seed phrase!

success_page.subtitle: Keep your seed phrase safe and remember that it's the only key to all you have on Decentr.

tips.tip1: Save the backup in multiple places and never share the phrase with anyone.
tips.tip2: Be careful of phishing! No one from Decentr will ever ask for your seed phrase!
tips.tip3: If you have questions or see something suspicious, email support@decentr.net.

success_page.title: Congratulations, you're all set!
